tossup_question: 12) PHYSICS  Kepler’s second law, which states that the orbital speed of satellites is inversely proportional to distance, is a consequence of the conservation of what quantity?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Energy
X) Heat
Y) Angular momentum
Z) Mass
bonus_question: 12) PHYSICS  A projectile is fired at 19.6 meters/second vertically upward. What is its speed and direction at time t=3 seconds?
